H0.text: In the original television series of 'Star Trek' (not the pilot edition) who played the part of 'Scottie'. William Shatner

H1.text: In the original television series of 'Star Trek' (not the pilot edition) who played the part of 'Scottie'. Leonard Nimoy

H2.text: In the original television series of 'Star Trek' (not the pilot edition) who played the part of 'Scottie'. DeForest Kelley

H3.text: In the original television series of 'Star Trek' (not the pilot edition) who played the part of 'Scottie'. James Doohan

A4.text: Following the cancellation of the original Star Trek series, Doohan was typecast and had limited success in finding other roles; he returned to play the character in the animated and film continuations of the series

A5.text: James Montgomery Doohan ... best known for his role as Montgomery 'Scotty' Scott in the television and film series Star Trek
